title: Failed to extract DefId: local_def_id_to_hir_id

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08) ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to extract DefId: local_def_id_to_hir_id 3eb4df032836746a-f4f148450f512265', compiler/rustc_middle/src/dep_graph/dep_node.rs:273:17 ```

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [evaluate_obligation] evaluating trait selection obligation `hyper::server::server::new_svc::NewSvcTask, hyper::service::util::ServiceFn) -> impl core::future::future::Future, anyhow::Error>> {internal::route}, hyper::body::body::Body>, hyper::common::exec::Exec, hyper::server::server::NoopWatcher>: core::future::future::Future` #1 [codegen_fulfill_obligation] checking if `core::future::into_future::IntoFuture` fulfills its obligations #2 [resolve_instance] resolving instance `> as core::future::into_future::IntoFuture>::into_future` #3 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items #4 [exported_symbols] exported_symbols end of query stack error: could not compile `server` ```
